channel.title: Ssl on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Ssl on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: Setting up SSL (https)
item.description: This feature is only available on Vanilla Cloud Learn More... Setting up SSL (https) with Vanilla Cloud Vanilla offers SSL support in Corporate plans and above. In order for us to to enable SSL for your forum, you will need to provide Vanilla with the following: Certificates start like this: -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----- Private keys start like this: -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- The SSL Certificate for your forum’s domain in PEM format.
